{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA9300 |revision=v1 |asin=B071DKY952 |newegg=N82E16833124595 |price=270 |est_release_date=01/03/2017 |fcc_date=03/28/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-EA9300 |ic_id=3839A-EA9300 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1622, P55V-02 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N02GVSIAA |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC2G63GFR-PBA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG, UE1643 P30, 638336-29 3; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM4365E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4365E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;6; ,,, |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, DFS (master), |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''1625''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024QAM) :• 1x '''750''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''''4000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC4000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9300/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA9300|pid=01t34000003qSnmAAE}} EA9250 may be an alternate or internal name for this product. *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9300 Q87-EA9300] (2017-03-28) - [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2773801 FCC label] - PSU 12V/5A *[https://fccid.io/Q87-EA9300/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3334517 FCC Internal Photos] - OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]] :"48SAB902.BGA" is silkscreened on the main board. :"48SAB904.0GA" is silkscreened on the LED board. *[[Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS)|DFS]] was added to the FCC entry with a Class II Product Change :request on 11/30/2017. ===Specifications=== [http://www.anandtech.com/show/10954/linksys-enters-mesh-wifi-market-with-velop-whole-home-wifi-expands-maxstream-lineup ''Linksys EA9300'' on '''AnandTech'''] *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/wireless/wireless-lan-infrastructure/bcm49408 ''BCM4908''] @1.8GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex-A53) *WLAN: 2x 3T3R AC [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4365E] + 1x 3T3R N [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/xdsl/bcm4366e BCM4365E] :WiSoC (ARM Cortex-A7), 3x3 MU-MIMO, 40/80MHz, QAM-1024 :DualBand, NitroQAM, 5GHz (2x 1625Mbps), 2.4GHz (750Mbps) ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33115-linksys-ea9300-max-stream-ac4000-tri-band-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''Linksys EA9300 Max-Stream AC4000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router Reviewed''
on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-ac4000-max-stream-router-and-ac1900-cable-gateway-from-linksys.39063/ ''Linksys EA9300'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===See also=== [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[Linksys EA9500]] - AC5400 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA9300]] - AC4000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9300 PPage] *[[Linksys EA9200]] - AC3200 Tri-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA9200 PPage] *[[Linksys EA8500]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA8300]] - AC2200 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8300 PPage] *[[Linksys EA7500]] - AC1900 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7500 PPage] *[[Linksys EA7300]] - AC1750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA7300 PPage] __NOTOC__
